issue.title: [CI] Gandiva C++ build is always triggered
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3582](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3582). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The `JDK: openjdk8 Compiler: gcc C++` build is always triggered, even when _e.g._ only Go files are modified:
- https://travis-ci.org/sbinet-gonum/arrow/jobs/444128507

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3582?focusedCommentId=16658303) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
It's not a Java build (despite the misleading "OpenJDK"), it's a C++ Gandiva build AFAICT. But, yeah, it should be skipped here...

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3582?focusedCommentId=16658324) by Uwe Korn (uwe):*
Issue resolved by pull request 2808
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2808>
